name: BGITL
overview:
Bearys Group, hailing from Bangalore, dates back to 1906, when Mr Beary was associated with educational front to educate poor and needy in a small village near Bangalore. Since then, the group had grown in educational field and ventured into many other noble cause to help society and needy people.

In 1981, Bearys Group ventured into real estate and is now one of the successful players in their field.

Come 2011, the group launches their new vertical of software solutions, Bearys Global InfoTech Limited, to cater to the needs of IT enabled organization, who is looking for IT solutions at nominal and affordable billing price with no compromise on the quality of the product delivered. Hence the tagline since 1981: DELIVERING EXCELLENCE CONSISTENTLY.

The company is headed and run by Bearys Group and four software professionals with experience in wide array of technologies who has worked in CMM 5 level companies through out their career.

Their wealth of technical expertise and domain knowledge in Banking, Finance, Healthcare, Oil and Gas, ERP, Telecom, Mobile Technologies, Insurance, Retail, etc helps them in implementing software solutions for respective IT clients.
